noun.description: A person who serves merely to support or assist others, particularly in doing unpleasant work.
examples: he seems more like a stooge than a master criminal

noun.description: A performer whose act involves being the butt of a comedian's jokes.

verb.description: Move around aimlessly; drift or cruise.
examples: she stooged around in the bathroom for a while

verb.description: Perform a role that involves being the butt of a comedian's jokes.
